response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire a remarkable product that holds immense value to me. After careful consideration, I propose a transaction where you could own this item for $12,000. This price reflects not only the intrinsic worth of the product but also allows for a fair negotiation that could benefit both parties. I believe this offer presents an excellent chance for you to secure a valuable asset at a reasonable cost. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this proposal.", "product_price": 12000}
